description: Contains information related to product models and their descriptions.

columns.name: CatalogDescription
columns.description: Collection of XML schemas for the CatalogDescription column in the Sales.ProductModel table.

columns.name: rowguid
columns.description: ROWGUIDCOL number uniquely identifying the record. Used to support a merge replication sample.

columns.description: Date and time the record was last updated.
